plugin.name: ðŸ“… Date Automations
plugin.description: Helping you move faster with dates and times
plugin.author: David Wertheimer

plugin.commands.name: ldn
plugin.commands.description: Create link to today's Calendar Note at cursor (e.g. [[2022-04-16]])

plugin.commands.name: date
plugin.commands.description: Insert date (without time) at cursor (uses your locale setting), e.g. Saturday, April 16, 2022 (or shorter)

plugin.commands.name: iso
plugin.commands.description: Insert date+time (in ISO format, GMT) at cursor, e.g. 2022-04-16T17:28:14.662Z

plugin.commands.name: now
plugin.commands.description: Insert (human readable) date+time at cursor, e.g. Saturday, April 16, 2022, 13:29

plugin.commands.name: now - ISO-8601 standard
plugin.commands.description: Insert ISO-8601 date+time at cursor, e.g. 2021-08-06 17:20

plugin.commands.name: time
plugin.commands.description: Insert (human readable) time at cursor, e.g. 06:55:22

plugin.commands.name: dp
plugin.commands.description: (Date Picker) Choose format and insert date/time time at cursor

plugin.commands.name: formatted
plugin.commands.description: Insert custom formatted (format) date/time per your settings

plugin.commands.name: wd
plugin.commands.description: Insert dates of current week, e.g. Mon 2022-04-11 - Sun 2022-04-17

plugin.settings.title: Custom Time String Format
plugin.settings.description: Used in /formatted command. See https://www.strfti.me/ for details on the formatting codes

plugin.settings.title: Time/Date Locale Setting
plugin.settings.description: Geographic locale for date/time formatting. e.g. en-US, en-GB, etc. e.g. en-US will result in mm/dd/yyyy, while en_GB will be dd/mm/yyyy. See https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/datacap/9.1.8?topic=support-supported-language-codes for a list of available locales.

plugin.settings.title: Date Style (in your locale)
plugin.settings.description: Used in commands like /now, /time, etc. Can be 'short', 'medium', 'long' or 'full'. Run the /dp command for help choosing the setting you want.

plugin.settings.title: Time Style (in your locale)
plugin.settings.description: Used in commands like /now, /time, etc. Can be 'short', 'medium', 'long' or 'full'. Run the /dp command for help choosing the setting you want.

plugin.settings.title: Use 12 hour format (with AM/PM)
plugin.settings.description: You can force 24 hour time format on/off, even in America!

plugin.settings.title: Timezone Override
plugin.settings.description: Usually 'automatic' is fine (will get timezone from your system).
